title: [GAMEPLAY] QoL changes to some AOE ultimates
body:
I think a couple of the champions with AoE ultimates need a bit of a quality of life change.

ever been playing miss fortune and lined up the perfect ulti only to click on something thinking to queue  it up as the next action after the ulti finishes and realised your ulti stopped after 3 shots.
had the same thing on galio? katariina? being able to time the ending of the ultimate on these champions just seems like a no brainer to me, and with katariina in particular this would add an additional deliberate key press to slightly slow down the instantaneous button spam quadra kills you see occasionally without actually affecting her gameplay at all.

This has really stood out to me lately as something that just seems out of place after i started to play Lucian (yes he is a bit different in that he can move while he channels, but the principal is the same). With all the other quality of life fixes that have been given to a couple of champions recently I thought it was worth the post, because really who even looks at the QoL icons they added... changing this would actually do something that has significant impact in only certain situations without changing your thinking.

edit : ok so the other champion with an ulti of similar use is nunu but I don't know off hand if he suffers from accidental cancelling

replies.body:
lol really? there cant be only 4 of us that have mucked up an AoE ulti.

I really think there is great benefit in not cancelling these ultis on click.
I would make using them feel a lot more natural.
